aboutcity: Learn more about Santa Rosa's history, heritage sites, and more.

Sta. Rosa de Lima Parish church

offlineStories.title: The Santa Rosa City Local Hero
offlineStories.text: Santa Rosa city has its own local hero, his name is Col. Basilio Barroma Gonzalez.

offlineStories.title: The Tiongco Brothers
offlineStories.text: The Tiongco Brothers (Fernando, Emilio, and Arthuro) are well-known pop artists in the "50s to "70s.

offlineStories.title: The 17th City Hood Anniversary
offlineStories.text: The Lion City of the South celebrates its 17th anniversary of the declaration of cityhood on July 10.
